[Storm's Lash](/Feats.aspx?ID=1312) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Wind and lightning have always been close friends to you. You can cast the [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97) cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

<title level="2">Storm's Lash leads to...</title>
[Hurricane Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=2446)
